page.title: 20AN EIGHT YEAR OLD'S DAY
page.content:
I get up in the morning at 8 am. My mum is usually in bed so I go and wake her up. I get washed and dressed while mum makes breakfast. Then I feed my rabbit, guinea pig, chickens, dog and cat. By the time I have fed the animals my breakfast is ready. I usually have weetabix and a cup of coffee. After breakfast I get ready for school at 9.00. At school I read, do maths and lots of other lessons. We have school dinner at 12.00 and finish school at 3.30. When I get home I go riding on my pony Tibs.When I get back from riding I have my tea. After tea I watch television. I go to bed at 8.00. First I learn my spellings then my dad reads to me. At last I go to sleep.
Domesday survey by staff and children of Black Torrington Church of England Primary School July 1985.
